publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-4861 Stewart Stevenson: Scottish Road Safety Framework—That the Parliament welcomes the publication on 15 June 2009 of Scotland’s Road Safety Framework to 2020; notes the road safety vision for Scotland, which is in line with other leading road safety countries, and further notes the road safety targets, priorities and commitments and the support of the Convention of Scottish Local Authorities and the Association of Chief Police Officers in Scotland to tackle road casualty reductions in Scotland over the next decade. Supported by: John Swinney*
